00024 /*
00025 ** replaceNodeList.c
00026 **
00027 ** based on list_template.c
00028 **
00029 ** where T has T_equal (or change this) and T_unparse

00031 
00032 # include "lclintMacros.nf"
00033 # include "llbasic.h"
00034 
00035 /*@only@*/ replaceNodeList
00036 replaceNodeList_new ()
00037 {
00038   replaceNodeList s = (replaceNodeList) dmalloc (sizeof (*s));
00039 
00040   s->nelements = 0;
00041   s->nspace = replaceNodeListBASESIZE;
00042   s->elements = (replaceNode *)
00043     dmalloc (sizeof (*s->elements) * replaceNodeListBASESIZE);
00044 
00045   return (s);
00046 }
00047 
00048 static void
00049 replaceNodeList_grow (replaceNodeList s)
00050 {
00051   int i;
00052   replaceNode *newelements; 
00053 
00054   s->nspace += replaceNodeListBASESIZE;
00055 
00056   newelements = (replaceNode *) dmalloc (sizeof (*newelements)
00057                                          * (s->nelements + s->nspace));
00058 
00059   for (i = 0; i < s->nelements; i++)
00060     {
00061       newelements[i] = s->elements[i];
00062     }
00063 
00064   sfree (s->elements); 
00065   s->elements  = newelements;
00066 }
00067 
00068 replaceNodeList
00069   replaceNodeList_add (replaceNodeList s, replaceNode el)
00070 {
00071   if (s->nspace <= 0)
00072     replaceNodeList_grow (s);
00073 
00074   s->nspace--;
00075   s->elements[s->nelements] = el;
00076   s->nelements++;
00077 
00078   return s;
00079 }
00080 
00081 /*@only@*/ cstring
00082 replaceNodeList_unparse (replaceNodeList s)
00083 {
00084   bool first = TRUE;
00085   cstring st = cstring_undefined;
00086 
00087   replaceNodeList_elements (s, current)
00088   {
00089     if (first)
00090       {
00091         st = replaceNode_unparse (current);
00092         first = FALSE;
00093       }
00094     else
00095       {
00096         st = message ("%q, %q", st, replaceNode_unparse (current));
00097       }
00098   } end_replaceNodeList_elements;
00099 
00100   return st;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void
00104 replaceNodeList_free (replaceNodeList s)
00105 {
00106   int i;
00107   for (i = 0; i < s->nelements; i++)
00108     {
00109       replaceNode_free (s->elements[i]); 
00110     }
00111 
00112   sfree (s->elements); 
00113   sfree (s);
00114 }
